entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.content:

In-App Purchases

  • Saƒülƒ±k PaketiÔºö‚Ç∫3,99
  • Erzak PaketiÔºö‚Ç∫3,99

Application Description

1984 kitabƒ±ndan esinlenen distopik bir hayatta kalma deneyimi. Aylƒ±k Distopya'da diktat√∂rl√ºk ile y√∂netilen bir d√ºnyada hayatta kalmaya √ßalƒ±≈üacaksƒ±n. ƒ∞yi bir yurtta≈ü olarak diktat√∂rl√ºƒüe hizmet edebilir ya da direni≈ü ile i≈übirliƒüi yaparak √ºlkeden ka√ßmaya √ßalƒ±≈üabilirsin. A≈ükƒ±n yasak olduƒüu, partinin istemediƒüi s√∂zc√ºklerin cezasƒ±nƒ±n idam olduƒüu bir y√∂netim altƒ±nda ya≈üƒ±yorsun. Fikir su√ßlusu olmamak i√ßin konu≈ütuƒüun kelimeleri iyi se√ßmelisin. Unutma seni her an izleyen bir ekran var. Bakanlƒ±ktaki i≈üinde ge√ßmi≈üi deƒüi≈ütirerek kazandƒ±ƒüƒ±n para hayatta kalacak erzaƒüƒ± almana zar zor yeterken, d√º≈ü√ºnmenin bile yasak olduƒüu bu d√ºnyadan ka√ßmanƒ±n bir yolunu bulmalƒ±sƒ±n. Sadƒ±k bir yurtta≈ü gibi hizmet edebilir, yakalanma korkusu ile a≈üƒ±k olabilir, direni≈ü ile diktat√∂rl√ºƒüe kar≈üƒ± √ßalƒ±≈üabilir, √∂zg√ºrl√ºk ya da tutsaklƒ±k i√ßin se√ßimler yapabilirsin. Dairende yaptƒ±ƒüƒ±n g√ºnl√ºk i≈ülerin hayatta kalmanƒ±n tek yolu olduƒüunu bilmelisin, erzaƒüƒ±nƒ±n yanƒ±nda zaman da kƒ±sƒ±tlƒ± bir kaynak. Bakanlƒ±kta ki i≈üine gitmeden √∂nce yemek yapmak, hastalƒ±ƒüƒ±n i√ßin ila√ß i√ßmek ya da psikolojine iyi gelecek ≈üeyler yapmak arasƒ±nda tercihler yapman gerekecek. Vicdan ile kararlar vererek tanƒ±dƒ±ƒüƒ±n insanlarƒ± korumayƒ± dene ya da ya≈üadƒ±ƒüƒ±n distopyadan kurtulmak i√ßin onlarƒ± arkanda bƒ±rak.

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • The DancerÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The GhoulÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The PriestÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The ExileÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we‚Äôre bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. ‚Ä¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn‚Äôt hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you‚Äôll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. ‚Ä¢ Intense, immersive narrative ‚Äì Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel‚Äôs worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. ‚Ä¢ A rich Lovecraftian world ‚Äì Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft‚Äôs tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... ‚Ä¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal ‚Ä¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened ‚Ä¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit ‚Ä¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Codenames
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket. A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking --------------------------------------------------- Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone. Inspired by the Iconic Board Game ---------------------------------- Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chv√°til, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon. More Content, More Fun ------------------------- While staying true to the original‚Äôs clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames. Play Anytime, Anywhere ------------------------ With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges. Build Your Secret Agent Career ------------------------------- Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster! Connect and Compete with Friends ----------------------------------- Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words. Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

entry.title: Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫399,99 [‚Ç∫399,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99

Application Description

Astrea is a DICE-deck-building roguelike that flips the script on deckbuilders by using dice instead of cards and an unique dual ‚Äúdamage‚Äù system: Purification vs Corruption. Features ‚Ä¢ Unique dual ‚Äúdamage‚Äù system: Purification vs Corruption - In Astrea there is a new type of ‚Äúdamage‚Äù system. Purification can be used to damage enemies or heal yourself. On the other hand, corruption can be used to damage yourself or heal the enemies. Pacify enemies through Purification, or Corrupt yourself to unleash abilities that help tip the scales. ‚Ä¢ Dynamic Health Bar system - With skills attached to your health bar, you can take Corruption to enable these skills and unleash powerful abilities. But be careful, if you take too much Corruption you will be consumed by it. ‚Ä¢ Not cards, but dice! - Build a dice pool that fits your playstyle. Choose from over 350 dice and three dice types; reliably safe, perfectly balanced, or powerfully risky. A dice type system designed with high-risk, high-reward in its core. ‚Ä¢ Customize your dice - Forge your fate by editing die faces with new actions, tipping the odds of powerful results into your favor. ‚Ä¢ Choose from Six Brave Oracles - Each possessing their own unique dice sets, abilities, and playstyles. From ingenious spellcasters to brutish berserkers, whether you like beating the opponent into submission or outsmarting them with clever plays, there‚Äôs an oracle for you. ‚Ä¢ Uncover over 170 modifying Blessings - Imbue your Oracle with unique passives yielding potent effects that changes up your fundamental tactics. Choose between Star Blessings, passive effects with lower power, or Black Hole Blessings, powerful passive effects with a drawback.

entry.title: Vostok ‚Äî Story Maker
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Welcome to Vostok ‚Äì your ultimate companion for crafting captivating stories and stunning collages, designed to elevate your social media presence! With Vostok, transforming your ideas into professional-grade posts and stories is now a breeze. Whether you're a blogger, photographer, or simply love sharing your life's moments on social media, Vostok provides all the tools you need to create content that will make an impact. Our sleek and user-friendly app seamlessly combines your passion for photography and storytelling, offering a dynamic platform to showcase your awe-inspiring moments. Embracing a minimalist style, Vostok becomes your canvas for unlimited creativity. A vast collection of templates, stickers, and effects empowers you to design unique stories that reflect your individuality. But Vostok goes beyond creative freedom; it's all about simplicity. Our intuitive interface makes editing and sharing your content effortless, freeing up more time for you to focus on crafting compelling narratives that your followers will adore. No more waiting! Embark on your Vostok journey today and craft captivating posts and stories that leave a lasting impression! Here's a glimpse of some of our features: ¬∑ 200+ design templates for social media ¬∑ Exclusive fonts with Cyrillic support ¬∑ 450+ unique stickers ¬∑ Atmospheric dust and grain effects for photos ¬∑ Variety of backgrounds: paper textures, marble, gradients, colors ¬∑ Ad-free with no subscription requirements ¬∑ Dark mode compatibility Recognized as one of the Best Apps of 2019 by Apple. With over 200+ templates, Vostok is your go-to toolkit for creating standout social media content. We eagerly look forward to your ideas and feedback. Connect with us at hello@vostokapp.ru or drop us a direct message on Instagram at @vostokapp.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
